llama2-70b_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 25th, 2022):

* Depart from Salt Lake City in the morning and take a flight to Twin Falls (Flight Number: F3809095, Price: $64, DepTime: 11:00, ArrTime: 11:55, ActualElapsedTime: 0 hours 55 minutes).
* Check-in at a budget-friendly accommodation in Twin Falls, such as the M1 Twin couch bed sleeps 1 guest (price: $608, minimum nights: 1, maximum occupancy: 2).
* For lunch, head to China Wok (address: 1534 Kimberly Rd, Twin Falls, ID 83301) to enjoy some Chinese cuisine.
* In the afternoon, visit Shoshone Falls (address: 22500 Hwy 93, Twin Falls, ID 83301), a beautiful waterfall located just outside of Twin Falls.
* For dinner, try some Mexican food at Los Jarochos (address: 407 Main Ave N, Twin Falls, ID 83301).

Day 2 (March 26th, 2022):

* Start the day with breakfast at The Coffee Shop (address: 1230 Blue Lakes Blvd N, Twin Falls, ID 83301).
* Visit the Twin Falls Dam (address: 30976 Hwy 93, Twin Falls, ID 83301) and take a guided tour to learn about its history and significance.
* For lunch, head to The Sandwich Board (address: 215 Main Ave S, Twin Falls, ID 83301) for some delicious sandwiches.
* In the afternoon, explore the scenic trails at the Twin Falls Reservoir (address: 2301 Hwy 93, Twin Falls, ID 83301).
* For dinner, enjoy more Chinese cuisine at The China Garden Restaurant (address: 1573 Blue Lakes Blvd N, Twin Falls, ID 83301).

Day 3 (March 27th, 2022):

* Check out from your accommodation and take a taxi (cost: $17) or self-drive (duration: 3 hours 14 mins, distance: 351 km, cost: $17) to Salt Lake City.
* Take a flight back to Salt Lake City (Flight Number: F3807678, Price: $56, DepTime: 12:35, ArrTime: 13:20, ActualElapsedTime: 0 hours 45 minutes).

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $120
* Accommodation: $608 (for 2 nights)
* Transportation: $17 (taxi or self-driving from Twin Falls to Salt Lake City)
* Food: $30 (lunch and dinner on Day 1), $30 (lunch and dinner on Day 2), $30 (lunch and dinner on Day 3)
* Total: $1,605

Note: The budget breakdown is an estimate and can vary depending on individual preferences and exchange rates.
